attributes.action: Keep schools closed for the rest of the year.
attributes.additional_details: The public is fearful enough as it is, the last thing family members need is the extra stress of sending their children back to school during this pandemic. Many people have expressed their fears and concerns on sending children back to school on the BBC News. It is completely unacceptable behaviour to send children back to school when they’re at risk of catching the Coronavirus. Primary schools should remain closed until this pandemic is under control.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson has announced his plan of reopening workplaces in stages. He has announced how he is thinking of reopening primary schools which I completely disagree with. Children are incapable of abiding by social distancing rules. This could put children, families and workers at risk.

You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404

Halt the reopening of schools until the NEU's 5 tests are met: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321101

Delay the reopening of schools to September: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318206 

Reopen schools in August with shorter summer holidays for a transition period: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320459

Keep schools closed in the UK until an effective Cov-19 vaccine is available: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319292
